title: Prajish Prasad
text:
I am an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science department at FLAME University, Pune. My primary research interest is in the interdisciplinary area of computer science education. I draw inspiration from learning sciences, software engineering and computing education literature for my research.
Interested to know more about computing education research? Check this blog post to learn more about this interdisciplinary area.
